comments: I loved her. She does read from slides but gives examples that are not on the slides that are on the test, so going to class is a good idea. There are 3 tests and a Project (counts for 25%) if you put effort into it you will do fine! she also give 3 other assignments that will help boost the grade! this is a good class with a GREAT prof - easy A

EASY Class! If you show up to class and pay attention, you are guaranteed an A! Make sure you don\'t neglect the easy points (i.e. case studies). Review is given, and tests are EZ! Yes, she does have 1 major project that accounts for 25% of your grade but if you choose the right group members and get started early, an A is 4 sure!

Do not take this professor. 1 major project, 3 class assignment type 1-2 page long and each test cover 6 chapters. Her class is so boring. She read from the powerpoints whats the point of coming to class for
Way too much work! Too many group project.
